title: Clinovo Expands Business Development Team
text: Date:10/13/2015 Sunnyvale, CA (PRWEB) October 13, 2015 Clinovo recently appointed Jeff Parr and Ed Donaldson to its Business Development Management Team, adding key expertise to the company’s fast growing clinical data solutions business. Jeff Parr has spent the past decade providing quality management software and consulting services to life science companies of all sizes, including Avery Dennison, Thermo Fisher, and Ab Sciex to name a few. He is based in Salt Lake City, a booming area for healthcare IT and life sciences research. “Clinovo has developed an innovative platform that empowers the user while it reduces the cost and time to market for innovative therapies and devices. I am excited about helping the life science community focus on bringing innovation to those people that can benefit the most," says Jeff Parr. Ed Donaldson has extensive life sciences experience as a project manager and business development executive, having worked for Hoffman La Roche and Thermo Fisher Scientific. Based in the SF Bay Area, he has been responsible for West Coast sales for several companies including DSG and Extedo. “I am delighted to join Clinovo. I have been in the EDC business for close to a decade, and I believe they offer the most innovative clinical technology solution with the free, cloud-based EDC solution,” says Ed Donaldson, who will be representing Clinovo at the OCT (Outsourcing Clinical Trials) Conference in San Diego on October 14-15th. “Jeff and Ed bring over 20 years of clinical data management experience” explains Sophie McCallum, Director of Operations at Clinovo. “Their combined industry experience acquired via leading pharmaceuticals and CRO companies will help us expand our fast growing clinical data management services.” By using Clinovo’s clinical data management software and services, life science companies significantly shorten time to FDA submission. Clinovo’s user-friendly EDC tools reduce overall study duration by efficiently capturing, cleaning and reporting data. About Clinovo: Clinovo is a leading provider of Cloud-based eClinical software. Clinovo's flagship solution ClinCapture is the only validated electronic data capture software, available for free. ClinCapture empowers CROs, Pharmaceuticals and Medical Device companies to build their studies themselves, lower their clinical trials costs and streamline their data capture processes. Clinovo is headquartered in the Silicon Valley. Contact information
